com.i2group.apollo.model.schema.transport

Class Schema

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.model.schema.transport.Schema

  • public final class Schema
extends Object
    A schema in the Intelligence Analysis Platform.
    Since:
    1.0

      • Schema

        public Schema(String id,
      long version,
      ItemTypes itemTypes,
      List<GradeType> gradeTypes,
      SourceInfoMandatoryFields sourceInfoMandatoryFields,
      LinkStrengthInfo linkStrengthInfo,
      List<LabelingScheme> labelingSchemes,
      String defaultLabelingSchemeId)
        Constructs a new Schema by initializing all mandatory fields.
        Parameters:
        id - A String containing the identifier of this Schema.
        version - The version number of this Schema.
        itemTypes - The ItemTypes that this Schema contains.
        gradeTypes - The GradeTypes that this Schema contains.
        sourceInfoMandatoryFields - The SourceInfoMandatoryFields that this Schema defines.
        linkStrengthInfo - The LinkStrengthInfo that this Schema contains.
        labelingSchemes - The LabelingSchemes that this Schema contains.
        defaultLabelingSchemeId - A String containing the identifier of the default LabelingScheme for this Schema.
